long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Instagram with Likeaway: Get Free Likes on Any Post!

Join Likeaway, the Like-for-Like network designed to help you grow your Instagram presence. Exchange likes effortlessly with a community of users who support each other. For every like you give, you earn a like in return—no strings attached.

This extension is completely free, secure, and easy to use. No personal information required; simply sit back and enjoy your boosted engagement.

Features:

Seamless Instagram Authentication: No password required—Likeaway detects your login status automatically.
Full Automation: Use your Instagram as usual. Likeaway runs in the background without affecting your activity.
Quick Pause Control: Easily disable automation anytime to pause likes.
Fair Exchange System: Earn a like for every like you give, instantly redeemable through the extension.
How It Works:

Install Likeaway in your Chrome browser.
Log in to Instagram as usual.
Toggle automation in the extension.
Start redeeming likes with a single click.
Fair Usage Policy:

Likes are exchanged only while the extension is active.
Likeaway performs only likes—no posts, comments, or follows on your behalf.
Boost your Instagram effortlessly with Likeaway, the ultimate Like-for-Like tool!
